description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. Bible Navigator X: HCSB is the first application on the XBOX 360 that allows the user to read the entire Bible from their 360.  Featuring easy navigation, bookmarks, and search tools, Bible Naviagtor X presents the HCSB translation in a great way to read scripture.  Various settings allow you to customize the reading experience with different themes, font sizes, and a scalable viewing area.
